title: Bloomberg Markets: PwC's Kumar on Potential Tax Reform
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: PwC's Kumar on Potential Tax Reform
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Rohit Kumar\u0010Principal/Leader of Washington National Tax Service\u0010PwC (Pricewaterhousecoopers)\u0010Discussing what it will take to get tax reform done, he sees a significant reduction in corporate taxes.
